thread.title: GoPro leads broad tech-sector stock declines
thread.title_full: GoPro leads broad tech-sector stock declines - MarketWatch

author: Jennifer Booton
title: GoPro leads broad tech-sector stock declines
text: The technology sector suffered a broad selloff in early trade Tuesday, mirroring a broader market selloff. GoPro Inc. GPRO, -8.94% led the decliners, tumbling nearly 8% shortly after the open. Shares of Microsoft Corp. MSFT, -3.50% fell more than 3%, while Netflix Inc.'s NFLX, -8.48% slid more than 4%. The tech-heavy PowerShares QQQ Trust QQQ, -2.25% fell 1.9%, while the Technology Select Sector SPRD Fund XLK, -2.45% declined 2%. Meanwhile, the Dow Jones Industrial Average, of which Apple Inc. AAPL, -2.42% Intel Corp. INTC, -2.31% IBM IBM, -3.23% Cisco Systems Inc. CSCO, -1.97% and Verizon Communications Inc. VZ, -2.61% are members, dropped more than 300 points.
